original_text: Ye shall have a song, as in the night when a holy solemnity is kept; and gladness of heart, as when one goeth with a pipe to come into the mountain of the Lord, to the mighty One of Israel.
korean_text: 너희가 거룩한 절기를 지키는 밤에 하듯이 노래할 것이며 피리를 불며 여호와의 산으로 가서 이스라엘의 반석에게로 나아가는 자 같이 마음에 즐거워할 것이라

sentences.original_text: as in the night when a holy solemnity is kept
as when one goeth with a pipe
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가 피리를 가고 갈 때와 같이

sentences.original_text: to come into the mountain of the Lord
to the mighty One of Israel
